trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref> that is associated with the properties that are bound, or can be bound, on an activity.
When users indicate that they want to edit property values, the **ActivityBind** dialog box opens to help in specifying the binding of properties on an activity.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor"></xref> class.
Edits the value of the specified object using the editor style indicated by <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor.GetEditStyle*"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
An <xref href="System.IServiceProvider"></xref> that the editor can use to obtain services.
The value of the object to edit.
The new value of the object.
serviceProvider contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Returns the editor style used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor.EditValue*"></xref> method.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.

A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref> value that indicates the style of editor used by <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.BindUITypeEditor.EditValue*"></xref>.
